summary: New Skeleton RR realistic thanks to Skulltyrant,  this small mod will change the position of the bow and quiver to a more back pack friendly position. i felt this is a good blend between none backpacks and those that use backpacks. i re-sized the Bolt Quiver and new location
descriptionHtml:
New Skeleton RR realistic thanks to Skulltyrant, this  small mod will change the position of the bow and quiver to a more back pack friendly position. i felt this is a good blend between none backpacks and those that use backpacks. i re-sized the Bolt Quiver and new location. The female version i used is CBBE so if your using vanilla female you will see some clipping. 
 depending on what bow you use. also included is a new crossbow draw animation. as will as new draw animation when your on horse back. this is still in the works but i hope to learn more about nifescope to make more changes.  don\'t forget to rate and comment.
author: sajuuknights
